item.title: AWS-Storage
item.description: EBS Elastic Block Store (EBS) provides persistent block storage volumes for usage with Amazon EC2 instances in the AWS Cloud. EKS使用EC2，AWS提供EBS CSI驱动 for EKS 每个Amazon EBS卷都会自动与其AZ一起复制，以
